title: All Outfits In Mario Kart World And How To Unlock Them
description: Mario Kart World gives you the option to switch up your style instead of forcing you to wear the same old overalls or dresses in every race. Outfits and costumes are mostly reserved for the major characters like Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, etc. However, some side characters, such as King Boo and Shy Guy, also have a few different choices. Below, we'll show you every outfit in Mario Kart World and how to unlock them all.There are 50 Mario Kart World characters to unlock so far, and over 100 costumes spread between them all. Main characters like Mario tend to have up to 10 outfits, while characters like Lakitu have around two or three.To unlock new outfits, you need to eat specific food items. For example, Mario's Touring outfit is unlocked when you eat burgers while driving around as Mario. Eating food immediately puts the new outfit on your character and unlocks the outfit in the racer selection screen for future use. Some costumes can be unlocked through multiple foods, but we've listed all the ones we've confirmed.There are drive-through stations near several tracks where you'll see glowing take-out bags to the side of the road. Drive through those bags to pick up a food item, then use it to obtain a new outfit. The most efficient way to unlock all outfits is to enter Free Roam and go to the location that contains the food you want. Then, switch characters to eat that one food item multiple times, unlocking all outfits for the specific characters who need to eat the same food. For more details, check out our guide on how eating meals and unlocking costumes works.If you're looking to learn more about Mario Kart World, you can click the stories and guides below for more information:Mario Kart World Lets Players Rewind If They Make A MistakeHow To Get Speed Boosts In Mario Kart World - All MethodsBattle Mode Is Back In Mario Kart World, Two Minigames ConfirmedMario Kart World Isn't Telling You The Truth About Character And Vehicle StatsMario Kart World Features Giant Trucks And Boats You Can Use To Dominate Races Touring MarioThe Touring Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger, which can be found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line. Dune Rider MarioThe Dune Rider Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through. Sightseeing MarioThe Sightseeing Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any pizza, ice cream, or fish and chips. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. Ice Cream can be found by driving forward from the Crown City starting line, then turning right after passing the Warp Plaza building. Fish and chips can be found at a food truck in Koopa Troopa Beach if you turn left just before the starting line. Cowboy MarioThe Cowboy Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any snacks from the Yoshi's in Whistletop Summit. Turn left just before the starting line to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks. Aviator MarioThe Aviator Mario outfit is unlocked by eating an item from the food truck on the Airship Fortress. Drive forward from the starting line to board the airship. Then, turn right and drive to the highest area on that side of the ship to find Toad in a food truck with a Yoshi's sign above it. Mechanic MarioThe Mechanic Mario outfit is unlocked by eating a snack from the food truck at Dry Bones Burnout. Drive forward from the starting line and turn right to find Toad in a Yoshi's food truck. All-Terrain MarioThe All-Terrain Mario outfit is unlocked by eating donuts, which can be found on Choco Mountain or Peach Stadium. Yoshi's trucks drive around the Choco Mountain track, and they carry food items. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well. Pro Racer MarioThe Pro Racer Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you need. Happi MarioThe Happi Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating taiyaki or candied apples, and both food items are found at Cheep Cheep Falls. Drive past the starting line, then immediately turn around to see the food stalls higher up to your left. Touring LuigiThe Touring Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger or ice cream. Pizza is found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line, and ice cream can be found in Crown City next to the Warp Plaza building. Oasis LuigiThe Oasis Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through. Gondolier LuigiThe Gondolier Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating any pizza or snacks. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. For the snacks, turn left just before the starting line in Whistletop Summit to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks. Mechanic LuigiThe Mechanic Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating a snack from the food truck at Dry Bones Burnout. Drive forward from the starting line and turn right to find Toad in a Yoshi's food truck. All-Terrain LuigiThe All-Terrain Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating donuts, which can be found on Choco Mountain or Peach Stadium. Yoshi's trucks drive around the Choco Mountain track, and they carry food items. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well. Pro Racer LuigiThe Pro Racer Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you want. Happi LuigiThe Happi Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating taiyaki or candied apples, and both food items are found at Cheep Cheep Falls. Drive past the starting line, then immediately turn around to see the food stalls higher up to your left. Farmer LuigiThe Farmer Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating the soft-serve dessert from Moo Moo Meadows. As soon as you teleport to the location, turn right toward Peach Stadium and drive off-road. You'll see the Yoshi's drive-through on the other side of a large barn. Touring PeachThe Touring Peach outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger or ice cream. Pizza is found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line, and ice cream can be found in Crown City next to the Warp Plaza building. Mario Kart World gives you the option to switch up your style instead of forcing you to wear the same old overalls or dresses in every race. Outfits and costumes are mostly reserved for the major characters like Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, etc. However, some side characters, such as King Boo and Shy Guy, also have a few different choices. Below, we'll show you every outfit in Mario Kart World and how to unlock them all.

There are 50 Mario Kart World characters to unlock so far, and over 100 costumes spread between them all. Main characters like Mario tend to have up to 10 outfits, while characters like Lakitu have around two or three.

To unlock new outfits, you need to eat specific food items. For example, Mario's Touring outfit is unlocked when you eat burgers while driving around as Mario. Eating food immediately puts the new outfit on your character and unlocks the outfit in the racer selection screen for future use. Some costumes can be unlocked through multiple foods, but we've listed all the ones we've confirmed.

There are drive-through stations near several tracks where you'll see glowing take-out bags to the side of the road. Drive through those bags to pick up a food item, then use it to obtain a new outfit. The most efficient way to unlock all outfits is to enter Free Roam and go to the location that contains the food you want. Then, switch characters to eat that one food item multiple times, unlocking all outfits for the specific characters who need to eat the same food. For more details, check out our guide on how eating meals and unlocking costumes works.

If you're looking to learn more about Mario Kart World, you can click the stories and guides below for more information:

  • Mario Kart World Lets Players Rewind If They Make A Mistake
  • How To Get Speed Boosts In Mario Kart World - All Methods
  • Battle Mode Is Back In Mario Kart World, Two Minigames Confirmed
  • Mario Kart World Isn't Telling You The Truth About Character And Vehicle Stats
  • Mario Kart World Features Giant Trucks And Boats You Can Use To Dominate Races

Touring Mario

The Touring Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger, which can be found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line.

Dune Rider Mario

The Dune Rider Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through.

Sightseeing Mario

The Sightseeing Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any pizza, ice cream, or fish and chips. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. Ice Cream can be found by driving forward from the Crown City starting line, then turning right after passing the Warp Plaza building. Fish and chips can be found at a food truck in Koopa Troopa Beach if you turn left just before the starting line.

Cowboy Mario

The Cowboy Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any snacks from the Yoshi's in Whistletop Summit. Turn left just before the starting line to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks.

Aviator Mario

The Aviator Mario outfit is unlocked by eating an item from the food truck on the Airship Fortress. Drive forward from the starting line to board the airship. Then, turn right and drive to the highest area on that side of the ship to find Toad in a food truck with a Yoshi's sign above it.

Mechanic Mario

The Mechanic Mario outfit is unlocked by eating a snack from the food truck at Dry Bones Burnout. Drive forward from the starting line and turn right to find Toad in a Yoshi's food truck.

All-Terrain Mario

The All-Terrain Mario outfit is unlocked by eating donuts, which can be found on Choco Mountain or Peach Stadium. Yoshi's trucks drive around the Choco Mountain track, and they carry food items. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well.

Pro Racer Mario

The Pro Racer Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you need.
